summary: Fixes the effect display bug with the Talos Shrine effect.
descriptionHtml:
Praying at the Shrine of Talos activates an effect that fortifies shout cooldown by 20%. However, the description says 0%. This plugin fixes the description to properly reflect the bonus.

________

INSTRUCTIONS

Simply download with the Nexus Mod Manager, or Download the .zip archive manually and extract the included .esp to Skyrim\'s data folder, usually located at \"Program Files\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\data\". Upon opening the game, choose \"Data Files\" and make sure TalosShrineFix.esp is enabled.
________

VERSION HISTORY

1.0 - Fixes description for Talos Shrine effect.

________

FAQ

Q: What UI mods are you using in the images?
A: I\'m using [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=667]QD Inventory[/url], with the [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=95]Morpheus font[/url].

________

OTHER BUG FIXES

The following are more bug fixes that help to clean up vanilla Skyrim. Contact me about exchanging links.
